writingDetail.html:
1

Photorealistic head of woman made entirely out of clementine fruit, face is made with an clementine slice, skin texture looks like the inside of clementines, skin color is orange and plate

完全由克莱门汀水果制成的逼真的女人头，脸上有一片克莱门汀，皮肤质地看起来像克莱门汀的内部，皮肤颜色是橙色和盘子

2

A white horse and black stallion touching their heads together against a white background, in the style of oilpainted portrait., front view

一匹白马和一匹黑色种马在白色背景下，以油画肖像的风格，把头靠在一起。，正面视图

3

Full-body portrait of a Japanese man with tan skin, dressed in all-white attire including a hoodie, holding a sniper rifle. Surround him with small robotic companions positioned as if they are his loyal followers. Futuristic, cinematic lighting, showcasing detailed textures on the man's attire and the intricate design of the robots. Highly realistic, dynamic setting, full-body view

一名棕褐色皮肤的日本男子的全身肖像，身穿全白色服装，包括连帽衫，手持狙击步枪。用小型机器人同伴包围他，就像他们是他的忠实追随者一样。未来主义、电影般的灯光，展示了男人服装上的细节纹理和机器人的复杂设计。高度逼真、动态设置、全身视图

4

Round metal ring with open center, black and red color scheme. Economical shape, smooth metal surface. It is designed specifically for mecha sculpting and engineering work. The design includes multiple lighting points to highlight the intricate details of its structure. There are also some cables hanging from it. In the style of concept art.

圆形金属环，中心开口，黑色和红色配色方案。外形经济，金属表面光滑。它是专门为机械雕刻和工程工作而设计的。该设计包括多个照明点，以突出其结构的复杂细节。上面还挂着一些电缆。以概念艺术的风格。

5

a painting of an abstract violin and a violin case with a bow, masterful composition!!!, orphism style, graphic musicality, cubism style, virtuosic painting, synthetic cubism, cubist style, complex composition!!, artistic!!! composition, the god of music, artwork, double bass, in style of digital painting, ✏️🎨, wonderful compositions

一幅抽象小提琴和一个带弓的小提琴盒的画，构图精湛！！！，变形风格、图形音乐性、立体主义风格、精湛的绘画、合成立体主义、立体派风格、复杂的构图！！，艺术！！！作曲，音乐之神，艺术品，低音提琴，数字绘画风格，✏️🎨, 精彩的作品

6

Create a storyboard frame in a multi-screen comic book style, formatted 9x16. The frame should include a medium shot of a character, a close-up of their eye, and a wide shot of the environment, all integrated into one cohesive design. Incorporate more than 5 images, each with speech bubbles to display dialogue, using dynamic composition and vibrant comic art style

以多屏幕漫画书风格创建一个9x16格式的故事板框架。画面应该包括一个角色的中镜头、他们眼睛的特写镜头和环境的广角镜头，所有这些都整合到一个连贯的设计中。使用动态构图和充满活力的漫画艺术风格，结合5张以上的图像，每张图像都有语音气泡来显示对话

7

Aliens and pharaohs face each other. photo, photography, high-definition, ultra-photorealistic, hyperrealistic, lifelike, photorealistic, --no painted, illustrated, 3D, Cartoons.

外星人和法老面对面。照片、摄影、高清、超真实感、超现实感、逼真、照片级真实感——没有绘画、插图、3D、卡通。

8

a 70s style psychedelic poster. muted colors, low contrast

70年代风格的迷幻海报。柔和的颜色，低对比度

9

Word "WU TANG", large typography, poster design, yellow color background, graffiti

“吴堂”字，大字体，海报设计，黄色背景，涂鸦

10

A close-up of a face with lips and nose, surrounded by white daisies, in the style of James Jean and Tom Eckersley, a flat illustration, risograph print.

詹姆斯·吉恩和汤姆·埃克斯利风格的一张嘴唇和鼻子被白色雏菊环绕的特写照片，平面插图，risograph印刷。

11

A vintage film camera resting on a wooden table, surrounded by scattered photos capturing the highlights of a young couple's journey. The setting evokes a sense of timeless love and the beauty of ordinary moments preserved in film.

一台老式的胶片相机放在一张木桌上，周围散落着拍摄一对年轻夫妇旅程亮点的照片。这个场景唤起了一种永恒的爱和电影中保存的平凡时刻的美丽。

12

A lioness and her cub, both with golden fur, lying on the grass in an open field, gazing curiously at each other. In the style of Pixar, in the style of Disney, oil painting, fantasy art, ultra-realistic, high resolution, super detailed.

一头母狮和她的幼崽，都有金色的皮毛，躺在开阔地的草地上，好奇地凝视着对方。在皮克斯风格中，在迪士尼风格中，油画、幻想艺术、超现实、高分辨率、超细节。

13

Photograph of an African mother holding her baby, taken in the style of Nikon D70s.

一位非洲母亲抱着婴儿的照片，采用尼康D70s的风格拍摄。

14

A close-up of Akaza from Demon Slayer (Kimetsu no Yaiba), a menacing character with distinctive blue and black striped markings covering his face and body. Akaza's eyes are intense, with golden irises containing intricate kanji symbols, exuding a fierce and intimidating aura. His expression is sinister, with a wicked grin that reveals sharp fangs, and his gaze is focused directly at the viewer. His thin, angled eyebrows enhance his intimidating look. The background is a dark blue gradient, adding depth and contrast to highlight his pale complexion. The lighting accentuates the contours of his face, casting subtle shadows that give him a three-dimensional, powerful appearance. In the foreground, part of his hand is visible, reaching out as if to grab or strike, adding depth and a sense of action to the scene.

《恶魔杀手》（Kimetsu no Yaiba）中Akaza的特写，这是一个具有威胁性的角色，脸上和身体上都有独特的蓝色和黑色条纹。Akaza的眼睛很强烈，金色的虹膜上有复杂的汉字符号，散发出一种凶猛而威严的气息。他的表情很阴险，邪恶的笑容露出锋利的尖牙，他的目光直接聚焦在观众身上。他瘦削的斜眉让他看起来更加威严。背景是深蓝色渐变，增加了深度和对比度，突出了他苍白的肤色。灯光突出了他的面部轮廓，投射出微妙的阴影，给他一个三维、强大的外观。在前景中，他的手的一部分是可见的，伸手去抓或击打，为场景增添了深度和动作感。

15

A group of origami birds in white, with one red bird standing out as the leader. The background is plain and neutral to highlight them against it. This symbolizes magnificent professional photography in the style of White Background.

一群白色的折纸鸟，其中一只红色的鸟脱颖而出。背景是朴素而中性的，以突出它们。这象征着白色背景风格的壮丽专业摄影。

16

A black man wearing a pea coat made out of peas

一个穿着豌豆做的豌豆外套的黑人

17

Chubby, cute, fluffy little black cat, Lying flat on the ground, looking lazy, With a white flag in his hand,cute and well-behaved little black cat,funny facial expressions, exaggerated movements, 3D character, white background, a little fluffy, elongated shapes, cartoon style, minimalism, award-winning work

胖乎乎的、可爱的、毛茸茸的小黑猫，平躺在地上，看起来很懒，手里拿着白旗，可爱而乖巧的小黑猫，滑稽的面部表情，夸张的动作，3D角色，白色背景，有点蓬松，细长的形状，卡通风格，极简主义，获奖作品

18

A portrait of a blonde model with shoulder-length bob hair, wearing a blue blazer and a purple turtleneck sweater, posing in front of a solid violet background. The aesthetic is minimalistic, with pastel colors, in the style of David Newton.

一张金发模特的肖像，齐肩波波头，穿着蓝色上衣和紫色高领毛衣，在纯紫色背景前摆姿势。美学是极简主义的，带有柔和的色彩，是大卫·牛顿的风格。

19

An orange keyboard button with the text "Enter 2025". The background is black, and there are no other elements in front of or behind them. It looks like an online graphic design element for web pages or social media posts. This can symbolize new beginnings, transformation, setting goals, envisioning future success, community support, technology, and innovation, self-creation.

一个橙色的键盘按钮，上面写着“Enter 2025”。背景是黑色的，前面或后面没有其他元素。它看起来像是网页或社交媒体帖子的在线平面设计元素。这可以象征着新的开始、转型、设定目标、展望未来的成功、社区支持、技术和创新、自我创造。

20

A majestic close-up portrait of a Bengal tiger's face with intense amber eyes, detailed striped markings, and pristine white whiskers, captured in sharp focus against a soft green natural background, showcasing the magnificent feline's regal expression

一张雄伟的孟加拉虎特写肖像，有着强烈的琥珀色眼睛、详细的条纹标记和原始的白色胡须，在柔和的绿色自然背景下清晰地捕捉到，展示了这只华丽的猫科动物的威严表情.
writingDetail.title: 精选prompts：橘子人、黑白马、机械人、星际门、小提琴、漫画风格、外星人等
